forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms during the morning will give way to steady rain this afternoon. High 11C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 45F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 2C. SW winds shifting to E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 36F. SW winds shifting to E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
